title: Free 2 credit courses?
content: Recently the Pro Chancellor addressed students of the first year that they can opt for extra credits in any department. There is no mention of the same on the app/website. Can someone please clarify? TIA

comments.body: You can sign up for extra courses in the summer. They're 2 credits each and I think you can sign up for only at most 2. However, these are paid and you need to pay a decent fee per course. A lot of people take these up because it takes out the need to take up special topics in your final year.
